short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e: Dhakacom WebTrafficLight adds a strong and non-intrusive layer of security to your browsing experience
short.de: Mit Dhakacom WebTrafficLight fügen Sie Ihrem Surf-Vergnügen eine zuverlässige und unaufdringliche Schutzschicht hinzu.
short.es: Dhakacom WebTrafficLight añade a su navegación una capa de seguridad robusta y no intrusiva
short.fr: Dhakacom WebTrafficLight ajoute un niveau de sécurité puissant et non-intrusif à votre expérience de navigation

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Dhakacom WebTrafficLight is the best way to a completely secure Web browsing experience.

It is a free cross-browser add-on that intercepts, processes, and filters all Web traffic, blocking any malicious content and taking browser security to new levels.
